name: Nicer New Gmail
description: An update to 2018's New Gmail that creates a more uniform, modern look without text all running into each other. Actions are all aligned, tabs are more well-defined, and colors are consistent. Note that you must be using the new 2018 version of Gmail (currently beta as of this writing) for this to work. If the style seems to break Gmail, you're likely not running the new version. You should also select the Light theme (usually the default) from Gmail's theme selector to ensure some standard base styles. Full source code, build infrastructure, and theme for Kiwi for Gmail is available on GitHub.
additional_info:
1.13: Once again fixed the display of the logo, hamburger/apps/notifications buttons, and compose button (when the sidebar is collapsed). This is current as of January 14, 2018.

1.12: Fixed the display of the top header bar and search field, logo, compose button when the sidebar is collapsed, and made the Reply button visible again when viewing e-mails. This is current as of January 3, 2019.

1.11: Fixed the hamburger menu, logo, search field, compose button, and right sidebar CSS changes made through September 27th, 2018.

1.10: Fixed a Gmail CSS update made around August 29th, 2018 involving the positioning of the Compose button.

1.9: Fixed for Gmail CSS updates made around August 8th, 2018.

1.8: Fixed for Gmail CSS updates made around July 11th, 2018.

1.7: Fixed for Gmail CSS updates made around the weekend of May 20, 2018, and fixed the G Suite logo presentation in the top-right.

1.6: Consolidated colors (for now -- aiming to handle the sub-color variant in another way) and fixed text colors on the action bar when text is used for actions and on the Settings page.

1.5: Fixed and improved styling for the e-mail view and reply form.

1.0: Initial release
